dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Apple and Microsoft just announced a full search integration in iOS 15.

In the latest version of the iPhone operating system, iOS 14, Apple bolstered its own search capabilities with little fanfare, the Financial Times reports.

HostA: Absolutely. And The Wall Street Journal reported Apple will actually pay Microsoft a licensing fee—somewhere between one and three billion dollars a year.

HostA: And Epic Games, the Roblox maker, actually praised the partnership. They dropped their claims against Apple.
